newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: JD details capitalisation share award.
newsitem.headline: JD details capitalisation share award.

text.p: JD Group Ltd said on Monday it would award capitalisation shares to shareholders on register on September 13 and who hold more than 12,353 shares.
The new shares would be issued in the ratio of 0,8095 capitalisation shares for every 100 shares held.
Shareholders may elect to recieve a 17 cents cash dividend.
